<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->
# Dsym Node Formatting

Represents a symbol with interpolation (i.e. `:"#{foo}"`)
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
:"#{
  "this is okay"
}"
```

After:

```ruby
:"#{"this is okay"}"
```

## Formats within a array

Before:

```ruby
%I(#{foo} #{bar} #{baz})
```

After:

```ruby
%I(#{foo} #{bar} #{baz})
```

## Formats recursively

Before:

```ruby
:"#{:"#{:"#{foo}"}"}"
```

After:

```ruby
:"#{:"#{:"#{foo}"}"}"
```

## Handles a nested symbol

Before:

```ruby
:"#{:foo}"
```

After:

```ruby
:"#{:foo}"
```
